a bailout to keep the automaker from collapse in 2009. "I want to pay back the shyster loans," Sergio Marchionne said at an industry conference, using a derogatory term for an unethical lawyer or politician. Pay back the loans, get those out and then take[ the company] public. Sergio Marchionne , who is also CEO of Italy's Fiat SpA, has said repeatedly that the high interest rates on loans Chrysler owes the US and Canadian governments have been an obstacle in the automaker's return to profitability

veteran who had served as CEO of Novell and chief technology officer of Sun Microsystems, Eric Schmidt was brought in to provide some "adult supervision." On his Twitter account on Thursday, Eric Schmidt wrote: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed. "I believe Larry is ready" to take over as CEO, Eric Schmidt said during a call with analysts. "It's time for him to have a shot at running this."

Hyper9 enables IT organizations to efficiently and effectively manage todays dynamic virtualized environment by providing visibility and control, all in an easy-to-navigate application. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer , in a statement. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. Steve Ballmer took the unusual step in January of publicly announcing that he thought Muglia

win with a critical rebound and putback with 43 seconds left. Anthony Morrow 's work on the boards earned glowing praise from Allen Iverson after the game. He finished with 14 rebounds, two shy of his career high. When he puts his mind to it, he can do anything on the basketball court, Allen Iverson said. "He can dominate in every aspect. Rebounding, that's all effort. When Carmelo Anthony gets down low and starts banging with those guys, it's hard for people to defend him."
